mapper.sql: select userId, friendId, isFavorite from friendsInfo
mapper.select: select f.friendId from friendsInfo f, userInfo u where f.userId = u.userId and u.username = #{username}
select friendId from friendsInfo where userId = #{userId} and isFavorite = '1'
select f.friendId from friendsInfo f, userInfo u where f.userId = u.userId and u.username = #{username} and f.isFavorite = '1'
mapper.update: update friendsInfo set isFavorite = '1' where userId=#{userId} and friendId = #{friendId}
update friendsInfo set isFavorite = '0' where userId=#{userId} and friendId = #{friendId}
